title: Practical Software Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming concepts and experience with business software applications
context.additional_context: Field-immersive scenario-based learning environments designed to enhance current practitioners' work applicability

learning_goals: Solve at least 80% of software problems occurring in real workplace environments independently using PBL approaches
Use SRL strategies to develop learning plans and write self-assessment reports on a four-week cycle
Practice at least five software application cases in team collaboration environments through VR simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
